sentences.en: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.cn: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.en: A full-scale debate is under way on what ails the industry.
sentences.cn: 关于工业为何陷入困境正在展开一场全面的讨论。

sentences.en: He managed to lighten the generally lifeless debate at times.
sentences.cn: 他让这场总体很沉闷的辩论时不时迸出了些火花。

sentences.en: Here we outline some of the some-times conflicting forces moulding the debate.
sentences.cn: 在此我们概述一些有时影响争论的相互对立的力量。

sentences.en: His comments are bound to add fuel to the debate.
sentences.cn: 他的话必将为争论推波助澜。

sentences.en: His conclusions are hotly debated (= argued about strongly ) .
sentences.cn: 他的结论引发了热烈的讨论。

sentences.en: It was in the nature of a debate rather than an argument.
sentences.cn: 那更像是一场辩论，而不是争吵。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, philosophers debate whether it’s right to clone an individual.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，哲学家们就克隆人是对是错的问题进行辩论。

sentences.en: Nuclear power has always been a topic that has sparked off considerable debate .
sentences.cn: 核电一直是引起相当多争议的话题。

sentences.en: Small wonder that he decided to take no part in the debate.
sentences.cn: 难怪他决定不参加辩论呢。

sentences.en: The candidates confronted each other during a televised debate.
sentences.cn: 候选人在电视辩论中当面交锋。

sentences.en: The case of Harris has sharpened the debate over capital punishment.
sentences.cn: 哈里斯案激化了人们对死刑的争论。

sentences.en: The debate seems, in retrospect, to have been fixed from the beginning.
sentences.cn: 回想起来，这场辩论好像从一开始就被人操纵了。

sentences.en: the gun-control debate in the US
sentences.cn: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.en: The issue will be debated on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 这个问题将在星期二讨论。

sentences.en: The King's stand is bound to reawaken the painful debate about abortion.
sentences.cn: 国王的立场必然会再次引发关于堕胎的令人头痛的辩论。

sentences.en: The new drug has become the subject of heated debate within the medical profession.
sentences.cn: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.en: There is a debate about his fitness for the highest office.
sentences.cn: 针对他是否能胜任最高职务展开了争论。

sentences.en: There needs to be a properly informed public debate.
sentences.cn: 有必要让公众在充分知情的状况下展开辩论。

sentences.en: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.cn: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.en: This television program provoked a spirited debate in the United Kingdom.
sentences.cn: 这个电视节目在英国引起了激烈的辩论。

sentences.en: To add spice to the debate, they disagreed about method and ideology.
sentences.cn: 他们在方法和观念上都持不同意见，这使辩论精彩了很多。

sentences.en: Which of them has more musical talent is open to debate.
sentences.cn: 他们之中谁更有音乐天赋还未有定论。
